title: I wanted to make a video stating the easiest way to win games
body:
Hope this helps: skip to 3:20 , that is where i start talking about things. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3RA5873_PPg

Enjoy

replies.body:
I checked out your other videos also, you make a good coach. Are you going to do some more? Perhaps some topics could be:

- Objectives Priorities (i.e. when to do dragon and when not to)
- The differences between LCS and soloqueue (choosing champs, invading, level 1 stuff)
- What to do when behind (e.g. your bot lane just lost their tower)

I think these topics would be very handy for most players under platinum. From what I've seen out there OCE players really struggle with these.
cheers for your feed back I will see what I can do and hopefully a video maybe coming your way soon
Good video man, everyone under platinum should watch it.
